channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Linux kernel (KVM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Linux kernel (KVM)

item.title: CVE-2023-1513|2023-05-03T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- linux%20kernel%20%28kvm%29
item.description: A flaw was found in KVM. When calling the KVM_GET_DEBUGREGS ioctl, on 32-bit systems, there might be some uninitialized portions of the kvm_debugregs structure that could be copied to userspace, causing an information leak.
